text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text:
The spring Tenno Sho that my third win depends on—I'd like Rice 
there too.
Rice… in the Tenno Sho?

Why risk her chance to make history by letting another strong 
contender onto the field?

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text: The booing at the Kikuka Sho…

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text:
Denying Bourbon's Triple Crown was a feat worthy of praise, and yet 
the exact opposite reactions were the loudest.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text:
As chance would have it, the stakes at the Kikuka Sho are closely 
mirrored by the upcoming Tenno Sho.
choice_data_list: So you want Rice to run because…

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text: Because there's a certain sight I would have her see there.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text:
Some things can only be taught by a fellow runner, and I wish to take 
on that responsibility.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text:
You, Trainer, have your own part to play—getting Rice into the Tenno 
Sho.
The importance of this race for McQueen cannot be understated.
No doubt she thought long and hard before making this request.

But is she really okay with this? Won't Rice being there distract her 
from her own running?
choice_data_list:
You might not get another shot at three 
consecutive wins. Are you sure about this?

You might not get another shot at three 
consecutive wins. Are you sure about this?

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text: Heh. You think I'm going to lose, do you? I am very hurt.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text: For the record, I have no intention of losing. On my pride as a Mejiro, I shall achieve my third consecutive Tenno Sho title.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text:
You sure have a difficult job before you. No matter which of us wins, 
you'll have to console the other.

She flashes a teasing smile, but the upcoming race is anything but fun 
and games to her.

If this sight she wants Rice to see is that important to her, then who 
am I to say no?
choice_data_list: All right, I'll have Rice run too.
All right, I'll have Rice run too.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text: Good. I trust you'll keep your word.
At training the following day…

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text: Pant, pant… Um, how was my time?
Her times aren't bad. But when she practices against anyone, she just can't win.

Getting booed at the Kikuka Sho has made her shy away from being 
competitive.
Good. You'll be able to contend in the big leagues.
Good. You'll be able to contend in the big leagues.

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text: The big leagues? Have you decided my next race?
She won't like the decision. But if she's to ever win again…
choice_data_list: You'll be running in the spring Tenno Sho.
You'll be running in the spring Tenno Sho.

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text: …What? The spring Tenno Sho?!
You have what it takes. You proved that at the Kikuka Sho.

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text:
B-but… McQueen has her third consecutive Tenno Sho riding on that 
race…

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text: It's so important to her, I can't compete. Even if I win, I'll just…
Rice Shower hangs her head as if she can hear the boos again.
Practice ends without her agreeing to the race.

I won't force her to race if she doesn't want to, but this can't go on 
forever.

text_block_list.name: Mihono Bourbon
text_block_list.text: You're Rice's trainer?
Mihono Bourbon interrupts her training to talk to me.
Hey, Bourbon. Training all by yourself?
Hey, Bourbon. Training all by yourself?

text_block_list.name: Mihono Bourbon
text_block_list.text: Yes. An injury I sustained after the Kikuka Sho has finally healed.

text_block_list.name: Mihono Bourbon
text_block_list.text: How is Rice doing? Is she still hung up on what happened?
Bourbon was up on that stage too, right beside Rice.
She saw firsthand how much damage the booing did.
choice_data_list: She's… not quite back to her usual self.
She's… not quite back to her usual self.

text_block_list.name: Mihono Bourbon
text_block_list.text: I see…

text_block_list.name: Mihono Bourbon
text_block_list.text:
…I train after-hours like this not because of some directive to achieve 
victory, but because I want to.

text_block_list.name: Mihono Bourbon
text_block_list.text:
I simply can't stifle the urge to run. And it all started when I lost to 
Rice.

text_block_list.name: Mihono Bourbon
text_block_list.text:
I want to race her again, and I want to win this time. That is why I 
train.

Rice was the first ever to put a scratch on Bourbon's undefeated 
record.
Sounds like she's converted that setback into motivation.

Rice was exactly the same way. Having a rival pushed her to work 
harder.

text_block_list.name: Mihono Bourbon
text_block_list.text:
…Is there anything I can do? In order to meet her on the turf once 
more.
Bourbon…

"I want to win." The same ambition that Rice has lost, Bourbon has 
gained anew.
If Rice could see Bourbon now…
choice_data_list: Yeah, I could use your help.
Yeah, I could use your help.

text_block_list.name: Mihono Bourbon
text_block_list.text: Understood. I'll do as you wish—I mean, it is my wish to help.

Noticing the semblance of a smile on Bourbon's lips, I can't help but 
feel like things are looking up.
